ReadingListsCluster.description: Database cluster to use for storing the lists. False means the cluster of the current wiki will be used.

ReadingListsDatabase.description: Database to use for storing the lists. False means use the database of the current wiki. To use a table prefix, use '<database>-<prefix'>' format.

ReadingListsCentralWiki.description: Database name of the central wiki. This is unrelated to data storage (see ReadingListsDatabase for that) and only used to identify which wiki should be used for jobs and such.

ReadingListsMaxListsPerUser.description: Maximum allowed number of lists per user.

ReadingListsMaxEntriesPerList.description: Maximum allowed number of entries per list.

ReadingListsDeletedRetentionDays.description: Purge deleted lists and list entries after this many days.
